page.title: 09Sports facilities
page.content: In Grantown there is a{selection of {sports facilities.}In summer, locals and holidaymakers are welcomed at Grantown{Tennis}Club, Grantown{Golf Club, Grantown{Bowling}Club and Grantown{B.M.X.}Club. There is also a{variety of indoor {sports}available in the{Y.M.C.A. {Indoor Centre. Safe{bathing}is available at the bathing pool - a stretch of the River Spey. Many people also enjoy{fishing}in the River Spey which is one of the most popular fishing rivers in Scotland. In winter there are many thriving {badminton}clubs in Grantown. Golf continues until the snow is deep, then {skiing}takes over on the Golf Course. {Curling}is also a popular sport in winter.
